CAIM was born in the portuguese island of Madeira. After participating and winning several band contests, CAIM recorded an EP CD with 4 songs. Small radio stations started playing they'r music. They became national with the relese of the first album in the end of 2007. The album "Beg A Dime" got it's fare share of media atention, and alowed the band to participate in several hi-profile shows such as "Rock in Rio".

Curently living in Lisbon, the band releases it's second album, named "Work In Progress" November 22 (2010).
